ygData.messageBody:
--- Louis Stramaglio <LJS@...> wrote:
> Am I just not recieving emails anymore or has the
> traffic on here REALLY slowed down a lot? Also whats

Traffic has slowed considerably. Flames tend to drive
useful posters away shaking their heads.

> the going prices on PGT's now and runed falchions? I

I recently (Monday night) traded 150pp and a pair of
Dusty Bloodstained Gloves (AC 2, Wt 0.4, +25 Mana) for
my PGT. I consider that a fair trade; I have what I
want now.

===
:D
